DOC.brief_title: Cervical Motor Control Long-term Breast Cancer Survivors
DOC.detailed_description: Background : Breast cancer become common disease ; however survival rate improve throughout last year . As result , also mean breast cancer survivor suffer side effect concern disease treatment , case certain kind pain . It know 80 % breast cancer survivor suffer even 5 year completion treatment impairment associate high tendency towards depression , cardiorespiratory deconditioning even alter cervical control motor . Aim : To determine effectiveness physical therapy program base cervical motor control train order improve motor control , mood state quality life . Methods : Fifty-two long-term breast cancer survivor allocate experimental group ( n=26 ) control group ( n=26 ) . The experimental group receive nine-week tailored exercise training focus cervical motor control . Discussion : There lack knowledge effective intervention come deal altered motor control pattern cervical area long-term breast cancer survivor . Therefore , necessary study impact novel approach improve quality life population .
DOC.criteria: To 18 year old Have pass period equal 5 year since breast cancer diagnosis Have diagnosis stage I , II IIIA breast cancer Have sign inform consent Have medical clearance participation Inability get level 2 craniocervical flexion test Have diagnosis arthritis fibromyalgia Have cancer recurrence Have operate previous surgery cervical column To take treatment pain alter motor control last 12 month
